Package application

Class Pet

java.lang.Object
application.Pet
Direct Known Subclasses:
Corgi
public abstract class Pet
extends java.lang.Object
Class to represent a pet.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int healthLevel
    The health level of the pet.
    private boolean isSleeping
    Flags if the pet is "sleeping" (in ghost state).
    private java.lang.String petName
    The name of the pet.
    private int PUNISHMENT_AMOUNT
    The health benefit to a pet when an exercise fails.
    private int REWARD_AMOUNT
    The health damage to a pet when an exercise fails.
    private long timeOfLastExercise
    The time that the pet was last exercised.

  • Field Details

    • REWARD_AMOUNT

      private final int REWARD_AMOUNT
      The health damage to a pet when an exercise fails.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • PUNISHMENT_AMOUNT

      private final int PUNISHMENT_AMOUNT
      The health benefit to a pet when an exercise fails.
      See Also:
      Constant Field Values

    • healthLevel

      private int healthLevel
      The health level of the pet. Should always be between 0 and 100.

    • isSleeping

      private boolean isSleeping
      Flags if the pet is "sleeping" (in ghost state). Should be "sleeping" if its health level is between 0 and PUNISHMENT_AMOUNT.

    • petName

      private java.lang.String petName
      The name of the pet.

    • timeOfLastExercise

      private long timeOfLastExercise
      The time that the pet was last exercised.

  • Constructor Details

    • Pet

      public Pet​(java.lang.String petName)
      Constructor initializing with just a pet name.
      Parameters:
      petName - - The name of the pet.

    • Pet

      public Pet​(java.lang.String petName, int healthLevel, long timeOfLastExercise, boolean isSleeping)
      Constructor initializing with custom information.
      Parameters:
      petName - - The name of the pet.
      healthLevel - - The health level of the pet.
      timeOfLastExercise - - The time that the pet last exercised.
      isSleeping - - Whether or not the pet is "sleeping"/in ghost state.

    • getHealthLevel

      Returns:
      The health level of the pet.

    • setHealthLevel

      Sets health level of pet.
      Parameters:
      healthLevel - - The level to set the pet health level to.

    • isSleeping

      public boolean isSleeping()
      Checks if the pet is sleeping.
      Returns:
      True if sleeping, false if not.

    • setSleeping

      public void setSleeping​(boolean isSleeping)
      Sets the pet as sleeping or not sleeping.
      Parameters:
      isSleeping - - True if want the pet to sleep, false if not.
